Description: Jeeveco is a zero-budget waste management app designed to encourage community-driven cleanliness. Built with React Native, the app enables users to report waste locations, track cleanup efforts, and take action towards a cleaner environment.

TruthLens is an AI-powered fake news detection platform designed to combat misinformation. It leverages the Gemini AI API and a machine learning backend to analyze news articles and verify their credibility.
Gravity is a comprehensive academic resource platform designed to help students access study materials in a structured and efficient way.
